name: TheBoxOfAnswers
0:
”Alexa, open box of answers”
”Alexa, ask box of answers if I'll be rich when I grow up”
”Alexa, start box of answers”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: box of answers
des: Ask Alexa yes/no questions about an action, any time, and she'll provide a randomly-selected response (some variation of yes, no, or maybe). You can ask as many questions as you want as often as you want. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
